members.signatureBeforeChange: public static Thread copyProcessOut(Process p, OutputStream out, boolean close)
members.signatureAfterChange: public static Thread copyProcessOut(Process p, OutputStream out, boolean close)
diff: +    result.setDaemon(true); // this thread should not keep the JVM from exiting
